answers.answer: I'm due Sep 28th with a little girl. I feel ok. I work full time so I'm exhausted, after work I run my houshold from my bed, I eat there, hang with the kids there, watch tv there, dictate chores from there and then dont check to see if they are done cause I'm too lazy to get up. I'm not very big, in the tummy anyway, but my butt is enormous! As are my arms, Ick. Had preeclampsia with my other 3 and blood pressures are creeping up and protien now in the urine, so here we go again, have the 24 hour urine test this week, love having a big thermos of pee in my fridge.I have not registered, but went to babies r us and cannot believe everything I need. I have not had a baby in 11 years and I have forgotten a lot, also nothing saved, so literally starting from scratch. Other then that, I'm excited and all seems to be going well with her.

My baby is stubborn so I don't know what I am having, most days are better then othes, my doc gave me magic pills to take away the morning sickness so sometimes I forget I am preg at all, other times I am so bloated I feel like I could pop at any minute. ACK!

I'm 21 wks now and due Oct 3rd.I'm feeling like you on the no sleep and uncomfortable part...I toss and turn from right to left all night....and my hips are starting to ache.Now I have allergies (taking nothing for it) and sneezing or coughing and blowing my nose ALL night...ugh....so I am feeling like I'm pulling stomach muscles from doing it all.My stomach is getting out there now and had to buy some maternity jeans and some shirts...not filling them out quite yet, but regular clothes I was busting out of....my tummy is out more than baby #1, this is #2...I didn't show til 6 mths on #1.....I have the aches lately in my stomach and all around....figure it comes with the package though.....and I can't BREATHE!!!  ahhhhh....due to preg and allergies hitting me....so it stinks a bit there.Otherwise, for the most part, I am doing okay....but I do get winded much easier now...and when I go up a flight of stairs, it hits me kind of hard....out of breathe and just feel like out of shape.Oh and she's a girl!JT

Hey!!  I'm due Oct. 3d with a little girl, too!  I have been feeling pretty good, tired and hungry.  I started showing a few weeks ago, and now I am pretty big, all belly.  I went out today for some maternity clothes and they are so comfy.  Other than that, just excited and nervous!!

Hello all I am due Oct 4th. I am feeling pretty good. I am having a little girl too. I think shes going to be early though. OMG Yes, she gets right under my ribs. Nurse at the hospital yesterday didnt believe me at first till she couldnt find her heart beat. She put the doppler right under my ribs and there she was. Nurse was baffled. I laughed and said I told ya so. So yeah I thought the same thing I'm  WAY too early for her to be that high up, but for some weird reason thats where she likes to hang out and my uterus is for some reason big enough to let her get that high. All I can do is get up and walk around stretch and Hope and pray she will move cause she puts me in bad pain from being under there.

im due sep 21 with a girl, i have 2 sons and this has been totally different. i work full time,and its very hard. i have alote of discomfort when i just walk, i cant sleep through the night without havin to pee.......    im huge for 6 months... the doc asked if i was sure there wasnt 2 in there...lol .....  my oldest iw 13 and my youngest is 10  so im kinda starting all over.....and its fun !

I'm due October 5.  Today one of my co-workers looked at me and said "When are you due?" (all the while staring at my belly).  When I told her she said "Has your doctor checked to see if there are two of them in there?  You're really growing."  OMG!!!!Besides that and two people patting my belly without permission this week, I'm feeling pretty good!  This week EVERYTIME I eat, though, I get an acid-refluxy feeling...something Tums doesn't even touch.I feel like I'm getting my 'glow' back :)

question: Happy friday ladies!!  I was wondering who on here is due in spetember?  Im due Sept 20 and im having a BOY!!  Im just now getting big. I showed but now it's becoming MORE obvious and i love it.  Im all stomach((smile)). But Do any of you get uncomfortable like under your ribs.  like at the bottom.  It's mainly when i go to sleep and after i eat. You kow when you cough too much and eventually your ribs get sore, it kinda feels like that but not as bad. I didnt think my lil man could be up there this early?  But i dont know.  sleeping is getting a little uncomfortable now too!!  O the joys of pregnancy!!lol  sohow are you feeling?whats your due date?Have ya'll registerd yet?  O and one more thing, on your baby registry did you put the things on there that you liked despite the cost or did you register items according to what people think is affordable?  Im stuck because i have expensive taste but not to where they cant get it.  But my mom thinks some stuff is a lil expensive....but i want it ya know!!LOL  what would you do?be safe ladies!!God bless23w1d!! Getting closer!!
title: Who's due in September/ early October??  How are you Feeling...
